policy.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue=" ============================================"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue=" === ***  THIS POLICY IS READ ONLY ***"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue=" === If you have the need to customize this policy"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue=" === please contact CA APIM Support so we can improve customization capability"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue=" ============================================"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="This policy can be found and should be used as 'Encapsulated Assertion'!"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:CommentAssertion>
            <L7p:Comment stringValue="This policy removed an id_token"/>
        </L7p:CommentAssertion>
        <L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue=""/>
            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="content-type"/>
        </L7p:SetVariable>
        <L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue=""/>
            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="error.code"/>
        </L7p:SetVariable>
        <L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue=""/>
            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="result"/>
        </L7p:SetVariable>
        <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
            <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${azp}"/>
                    <L7p:Expression2 stringValue=""/>
                    <L7p:Negate booleanValue="true"/>
                    <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                    <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                        <L7p:item binary="included">
                            <L7p:Negated booleanValue="true"/>
                            <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                            <L7p:RightValue stringValue=""/>
                        </L7p:item>
                    </L7p:Predicates>
                </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${jwt}"/>
                    <L7p:Expression2 stringValue=""/>
                    <L7p:Negate booleanValue="true"/>
                    <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                    <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                        <L7p:item binary="included">
                            <L7p:Negated booleanValue="true"/>
                            <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                            <L7p:RightValue stringValue=""/>
                        </L7p:item>
                    </L7p:Predicates>
                </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:assertionComment>
                    <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="success"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                    </L7p:Properties>
                </L7p:assertionComment>
            </wsp:OneOrMore>
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:AuditDetailAssertion>
                    <L7p:Detail stringValue="No required parameter was provided for removing an id_token!"/>
                </L7p:AuditDetailAssertion>
                <L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="MTAz"/>
                    <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="error.code"/>
                </L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:FalseAssertion/>
                <L7p:assertionComment>
                    <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="error"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                    </L7p:Properties>
                </L7p:assertionComment>
            </wsp:All>
            <L7p:assertionComment>
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="parameters"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:assertionComment>
        </wsp:OneOrMore>
        <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                    <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${azp}"/>
                    <L7p:Expression2 stringValue=""/>
                    <L7p:Negate booleanValue="true"/>
                    <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                    <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                        <L7p:item binary="included">
                            <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                            <L7p:Negated booleanValue="true"/>
                            <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                            <L7p:RightValue stringValue=""/>
                        </L7p:item>
                    </L7p:Predicates>
                </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
                    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                        <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                            <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                            <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${separate_schemas}"/>
                            <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="false"/>
                            <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                                <L7p:item binary="included">
                                    <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                                    <L7p:RightValue stringValue="false"/>
                                </L7p:item>
                            </L7p:Predicates>
                        </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                        <L7p:Encapsulated>
                            <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigGuid stringValue="5fa28ea1-844e-4fe4-b8b1-5bba1dd1589d"/>
                            <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigName stringValue="MAG Access Token DB Remove - azp"/>
                            <L7p:NoOpIfConfigMissing booleanValue="true"/>
                        </L7p:Encapsulated>
                    </wsp:All>
                    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                        <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                            <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                            <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${separate_schemas}"/>
                            <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="true"/>
                            <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                                <L7p:item binary="included">
                                    <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                                    <L7p:RightValue stringValue="true"/>
                                </L7p:item>
                            </L7p:Predicates>
                        </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                        <L7p:Encapsulated>
                            <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigGuid stringValue="07a6c0ce-3266-49ad-bf20-b87b96a89fba"/>
                            <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigName stringValue="MAG Access Token DB Remove - azp (separate schemas)"/>
                            <L7p:NoOpIfConfigMissing booleanValue="true"/>
                        </L7p:Encapsulated>
                    </wsp:All>
                </wsp:OneOrMore>
                <L7p:JdbcQuery>
                    <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                        <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="DELETE JWT"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                        </L7p:Properties>
                    </L7p:AssertionComment>
                    <L7p:AssertionFailureEnabled booleanValue="false"/>
                    <L7p:ConnectionName stringValue="OAuth"/>
                    <L7p:MaxRecords intValue="1000"/>
                    <L7p:SqlQuery stringValueReference="inline"><![CDATA[DELETE FROM oauth_id_token
                                WHERE azp = ${azp}]]></L7p:SqlQuery>
                </L7p:JdbcQuery>
                <L7p:assertionComment>
                    <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="azp"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                    </L7p:Properties>
                </L7p:assertionComment>
            </wsp:All>
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                    <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${jwt}"/>
                    <L7p:Expression2 stringValue=""/>
                    <L7p:Negate booleanValue="true"/>
                    <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                    <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                        <L7p:item binary="included">
                            <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                            <L7p:Negated booleanValue="true"/>
                            <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                            <L7p:RightValue stringValue=""/>
                        </L7p:item>
                    </L7p:Predicates>
                </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                    <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${jwt}"/>
                    <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="."/>
                    <L7p:Operator operator="CONTAINS"/>
                    <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                        <L7p:item binary="included">
                            <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                            <L7p:Operator operator="CONTAINS"/>
                            <L7p:RightValue stringValue="."/>
                        </L7p:item>
                    </L7p:Predicates>
                </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                    <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${azp}"/>
                    <L7p:Expression2 stringValue=""/>
                    <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                    <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                        <L7p:item binary="included">
                            <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                            <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                            <L7p:RightValue stringValue=""/>
                        </L7p:item>
                    </L7p:Predicates>
                </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:CommentAssertion>
                    <L7p:Comment stringValue="=== Use the jwt-signature as jwt_id"/>
                </L7p:CommentAssertion>
                <L7p:Regex>
                    <L7p:AutoTarget booleanValue="false"/>
                    <L7p:CaptureVar stringValue="jwt-signature"/>
                    <L7p:OtherTargetMessageVariable stringValue="jwt"/>
                    <L7p:Regex stringValue=".*?[?.].*[.]([a-zA-Z0-9-_]{1,512}).*"/>
                    <L7p:Replacement stringValue=""/>
                    <L7p:Target target="OTHER"/>
                </L7p:Regex>
                <L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="JHtqd3Qtc2lnbmF0dXJlWzFdfQ=="/>
                    <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="jwt-signature"/>
                </L7p:SetVariable>
                <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
                    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                        <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                            <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                            <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${separate_schemas}"/>
                            <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="false"/>
                            <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                                <L7p:item binary="included">
                                    <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                                    <L7p:RightValue stringValue="false"/>
                                </L7p:item>
                            </L7p:Predicates>
                        </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                        <L7p:Encapsulated>
                            <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigGuid stringValue="30025f35-b02f-4d86-86d7-7b19c456a808"/>
                            <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigName stringValue="MAG Access Token DB Remove - jwt_signature"/>
                            <L7p:NoOpIfConfigMissing booleanValue="true"/>
                        </L7p:Encapsulated>
                    </wsp:All>
                    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                        <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                            <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                            <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${separate_schemas}"/>
                            <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="true"/>
                            <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                                <L7p:item binary="included">
                                    <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                                    <L7p:RightValue stringValue="true"/>
                                </L7p:item>
                            </L7p:Predicates>
                        </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                        <L7p:Encapsulated>
                            <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigGuid stringValue="b8a02d7d-673c-46ec-ae4e-4320f79ce396"/>
                            <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigName stringValue="MAG Access Token DB Remove - jwt_signature (separate schemas)"/>
                            <L7p:NoOpIfConfigMissing booleanValue="true"/>
                        </L7p:Encapsulated>
                    </wsp:All>
                </wsp:OneOrMore>
                <L7p:JdbcQuery>
                    <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                        <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="DELETE JWT"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                        </L7p:Properties>
                    </L7p:AssertionComment>
                    <L7p:AssertionFailureEnabled booleanValue="false"/>
                    <L7p:ConnectionName stringValue="OAuth"/>
                    <L7p:MaxRecords intValue="1000"/>
                    <L7p:SqlQuery stringValueReference="inline"><![CDATA[DELETE FROM oauth_id_token
                                WHERE jwt_id = ${jwt-signature}]]></L7p:SqlQuery>
                </L7p:JdbcQuery>
                <L7p:assertionComment>
                    <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="jwt_signature"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="Extract the signature and use it for lookup via 'jwt_id'"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                    </L7p:Properties>
                </L7p:assertionComment>
            </wsp:All>
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                    <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${jwt}"/>
                    <L7p:Expression2 stringValue=""/>
                    <L7p:Negate booleanValue="true"/>
                    <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                    <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                        <L7p:item binary="included">
                            <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                            <L7p:Negated booleanValue="true"/>
                            <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                            <L7p:RightValue stringValue=""/>
                        </L7p:item>
                    </L7p:Predicates>
                </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                    <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${jwt}"/>
                    <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="."/>
                    <L7p:Negate booleanValue="true"/>
                    <L7p:Operator operator="CONTAINS"/>
                    <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                        <L7p:item binary="included">
                            <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                            <L7p:Negated booleanValue="true"/>
                            <L7p:Operator operator="CONTAINS"/>
                            <L7p:RightValue stringValue="."/>
                        </L7p:item>
                    </L7p:Predicates>
                </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                    <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${azp}"/>
                    <L7p:Expression2 stringValue=""/>
                    <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                    <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                        <L7p:item binary="included">
                            <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                            <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                            <L7p:RightValue stringValue=""/>
                        </L7p:item>
                    </L7p:Predicates>
                </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
                    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                        <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                            <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                            <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${separate_schemas}"/>
                            <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="false"/>
                            <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                                <L7p:item binary="included">
                                    <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                                    <L7p:RightValue stringValue="false"/>
                                </L7p:item>
                            </L7p:Predicates>
                        </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                        <L7p:Encapsulated>
                            <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigGuid stringValue="63a14035-7d4f-4df5-ab05-ff19335b2640"/>
                            <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigName stringValue="MAG Access Token DB Remove - jwt_id"/>
                            <L7p:NoOpIfConfigMissing booleanValue="true"/>
                        </L7p:Encapsulated>
                    </wsp:All>
                    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                        <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                            <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                            <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${separate_schemas}"/>
                            <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="true"/>
                            <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                                <L7p:item binary="included">
                                    <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                                    <L7p:RightValue stringValue="true"/>
                                </L7p:item>
                            </L7p:Predicates>
                        </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                        <L7p:Encapsulated>
                            <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigGuid stringValue="61635996-f9ca-4724-9aa0-2fc97ce1e161"/>
                            <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigName stringValue="MAG Access Token DB Remove - jwt_id (separate schema)"/>
                            <L7p:NoOpIfConfigMissing booleanValue="true"/>
                        </L7p:Encapsulated>
                    </wsp:All>
                </wsp:OneOrMore>
                <L7p:JdbcQuery>
                    <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                        <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="DELETE JWT"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                        </L7p:Properties>
                    </L7p:AssertionComment>
                    <L7p:AssertionFailureEnabled booleanValue="false"/>
                    <L7p:ConnectionName stringValue="OAuth"/>
                    <L7p:MaxRecords intValue="1000"/>
                    <L7p:SqlQuery stringValueReference="inline"><![CDATA[DELETE FROM oauth_id_token
                                WHERE jwt_id = ${jwt}]]></L7p:SqlQuery>
                </L7p:JdbcQuery>
                <L7p:assertionComment>
                    <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="jwt_id"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="Given 'jwt' == jwt-signature"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                    </L7p:Properties>
                </L7p:assertionComment>
            </wsp:All>
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                    <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                    <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${jwt}"/>
                    <L7p:Expression2 stringValue=""/>
                    <L7p:Negate booleanValue="true"/>
                    <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                    <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                        <L7p:item binary="included">
                            <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                            <L7p:Negated booleanValue="true"/>
                            <L7p:Operator operator="EMPTY"/>
                            <L7p:RightValue stringValue=""/>
                        </L7p:item>
                    </L7p:Predicates>
                </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                <wsp:OneOrMore wsp:Usage="Required">
                    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                        <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                            <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                            <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${separate_schemas}"/>
                            <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="false"/>
                            <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                                <L7p:item binary="included">
                                    <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                                    <L7p:RightValue stringValue="false"/>
                                </L7p:item>
                            </L7p:Predicates>
                        </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                        <L7p:Encapsulated>
                            <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigGuid stringValue="dbd834b4-2d7a-4db7-88bc-23813919cb70"/>
                            <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigName stringValue="MAG Access Token DB Remove - jwt"/>
                            <L7p:NoOpIfConfigMissing booleanValue="true"/>
                        </L7p:Encapsulated>
                    </wsp:All>
                    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                        <L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                            <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                            <L7p:Expression1 stringValue="${separate_schemas}"/>
                            <L7p:Expression2 stringValue="true"/>
                            <L7p:Predicates predicates="included">
                                <L7p:item binary="included">
                                    <L7p:CaseSensitive booleanValue="false"/>
                                    <L7p:RightValue stringValue="true"/>
                                </L7p:item>
                            </L7p:Predicates>
                        </L7p:ComparisonAssertion>
                        <L7p:Encapsulated>
                            <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigGuid stringValue="ff2d4666-7650-48c1-a9e2-116476960e5f"/>
                            <L7p:EncapsulatedAssertionConfigName stringValue="MAG Access Token DB Remove - jwt (separate schema)"/>
                            <L7p:NoOpIfConfigMissing booleanValue="true"/>
                        </L7p:Encapsulated>
                    </wsp:All>
                </wsp:OneOrMore>
                <L7p:JdbcQuery>
                    <L7p:AssertionComment assertionComment="included">
                        <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                            <L7p:entry>
                                <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                                <L7p:value stringValue="DELETE JWT"/>
                            </L7p:entry>
                        </L7p:Properties>
                    </L7p:AssertionComment>
                    <L7p:AssertionFailureEnabled booleanValue="false"/>
                    <L7p:ConnectionName stringValue="OAuth"/>
                    <L7p:MaxRecords intValue="1000"/>
                    <L7p:SqlQuery stringValueReference="inline"><![CDATA[DELETE FROM oauth_id_token
                                WHERE jwt = ${jwt}]]></L7p:SqlQuery>
                </L7p:JdbcQuery>
                <L7p:assertionComment>
                    <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="jwt"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                    </L7p:Properties>
                </L7p:assertionComment>
            </wsp:All>
            <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
                <L7p:AuditDetailAssertion>
                    <L7p:Detail stringValue="The id_token could not be removed!"/>
                </L7p:AuditDetailAssertion>
                <L7p:SetVariable>
                    <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="MDAw"/>
                    <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="error.code"/>
                </L7p:SetVariable>
                <L7p:FalseAssertion/>
                <L7p:assertionComment>
                    <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="Error"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:entry>
                            <L7p:key stringValue="RIGHT.COMMENT"/>
                            <L7p:value stringValue="No valid parameters were passed in. Or the JDBC connection failed"/>
                        </L7p:entry>
                    </L7p:Properties>
                </L7p:assertionComment>
            </wsp:All>
            <L7p:assertionComment>
                <L7p:Properties mapValue="included">
                    <L7p:entry>
                        <L7p:key stringValue="LEFT.COMMENT"/>
                        <L7p:value stringValue="action"/>
                    </L7p:entry>
                </L7p:Properties>
            </L7p:assertionComment>
        </wsp:OneOrMore>
        <L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="dGV4dC9wbGFpbjtjaGFyc2V0PVVURi04"/>
            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="content-type"/>
        </L7p:SetVariable>
        <L7p:SetVariable>
            <L7p:Base64Expression stringValue="cmVtb3ZlZA=="/>
            <L7p:VariableToSet stringValue="result"/>
        </L7p:SetVariable>
    </wsp:All>
</wsp:Policy>
